Master ARIS:
Perfect! From the Temple Einhasad in Gludio have received very important information. In the vicinity of Gludio found the subject from the world of Spirits of the Wind. Unfortunately, by this time the Delegation had already left the city. To deal with this case, the members of the Delegation sent Teresia. Now she must have already arrived in the city, so go and help her.
Look in Gludio in the Temple Einhasad high Priest Raymond. He will tell You where Teresia.
